毒: (doku) - veneno, toxina; dano, influência maléfica; má vontade, despeito, malícia
毒する: (どくする) - to be a bad influence (on something); to corrupt; to poison
毒づく: (どくづく) - to curse (at someone); to call someone names; to speak bitterly
毒にも薬にもならない: (どくにもくすりにもならない) - That will do neither harm nor good
毒を以て毒を制す: (どくをもってどくをせいす) - fight fire with fire; set a thief to catch a thief; fight one evil with another
毒を盛る: (どくをもる) - to poison (e.g. food, drink); to administer poison
毒を食らわば皿まで: (どくをくらわばさらまで) - In for a penny, in for a pound
毒を食らわば皿迄: (どくをくらわばさらまで) - In for a penny, in for a pound
毒イチゴ: (どくイチゴ) - false strawberry (Duchesnea chrysantha); mock strawberry
毒化: (どっか) - toxification; turning toxic; turning poisonous
毒女: (どくおんな) - (joc) (pun on 独女, (abbr. of 独身女性))  single woman; spinster
毒性: (どくせい) - toxicity; toxic; virulence; virulent
毒性物質: (どくせいぶっしつ) - toxic (poisonous) substance
毒手: (どくしゅ) - a dirty or underhanded trick
毒杯: (どくはい) - cup of poisoned alcohol
毒殺: (どくさつ) - poisoning; kill by poison
毒気: (どっき) - (of a) poisonous nature; maliciousness; poisonous air
毒気を抜かれる: (どっけをぬかれる) - to be taken aback; to be dumbfounded
毒牙: (dokuga) - presa venenosa; caminhos sinistros, meios tortuosos, garras, artimanhas, truque sujo
毒牙にかかる: (どくがにかかる) - to fall victim (to); to get into the clutches (of)
毒男: (どくお) - (2-ch term) lonely heart; male virgin; loser; geek
毒空木: (ドクウツギ) - Coriaria japonica (species of shrub)
毒突く: (どくづく) - to curse (at someone); to call someone names; to speak bitterly
毒筆: (どくひつ) - (wielding a) vicious or poison pen
毒腺: (どくせん) - venom gland; poison gland
毒舌家: (どくぜつか) - person with a sharp tongue
毒芹: (ドクゼリ) - Mackenzie's water hemlock (Cicuta virosa)
毒苺: (どくいちご) - false strawberry (Duchesnea chrysantha); mock strawberry
毒菌: (どくきん) - (ant: 食菌) poison mushroom
毒薬条項: (どくやくじょうこう) - {bus}  poison pill (anti-takeover measure)
毒蛇: (どくへび) - poisonous snake; poisonous serpent
毒蜘蛛: (どくぐも) - poisonous spider/venomous spider; wolf spider
毒蜥蜴: (ドクトカゲ) - heloderm (any venomous lizard of genus Heloderma, incl. the gila monster and the beaded lizard)
毒酒: (どくしゅ) - poisoned sake; poisoned alcohol
毒針: (どくばり) - stinger (of a bee, etc.); (only どくばり) needle covered with poison
毒電波: (どくでんぱ) - radio waves, as sent out and received by people's minds
比: (oi/kura) - compare , ratio, proportion; match, equal; explicit comparison (style of the Shi Jing); in comparison with ...
比える: (たぐえる) - to compare/to liken; to make (someone) accompany
比べる: (くらべる) - to compare/to make a comparison; to compete/to vie
比べ物にならない: (くらべものにならない) - cannot be compared with; no match for
比を求める: (ひをもとめる) - to obtain the ratio
比丘尼: (びくに) - bhikkhuni (fully ordained Buddhist nun) (san: bhiksuni)
比丘尼ん: (びくにん) - bhikkhuni (fully ordained Buddhist nun)
比例中項: (ひれいちゅうこう) - mean proportional (i.e. geometric mean)
比例代表: (ひれいだいひょう) - proportional representation
比例代表制: (ひれいだいひょうせい) - proportional representation
比例定数: (ひれいていすう) - factor of proportionality; constant of proportionality
比例税率: (ひれいぜいりつ) - proportional tax rate
